## Natural history notes

October Flower (Polygonella polygama) is a herbaceous perennial plant that can reach a height of 3 feet. Their leaves are simple, alternate, linear, stipulate with parallel veins. Flowers are white to pink with both male and female parts and superior ovaries. This plant makes for a desireable ornamental due to its attractiveness.
